main_menu.title: MEAN WELL INDUSTRIAL SMPS SOLUTIONS
main_menu.description: Mean Well power supplies are globally recognized for their high reliability, efficiency, and rugged industrial performance across automation, control panels, LED systems, and machinery applications. These SMPS units are engineered to deliver stable DC output even under voltage fluctuations, heavy loads, and harsh operating environments. With comprehensive safety protections and long operational life, Mean Well SMPS products are trusted across manufacturing plants, OEM machines, and infrastructure projects worldwide.
features: High efficiency up to 94% for energy saving
Wide input voltage range for industrial stability
Short circuit, overload and over-voltage protection
Compact metal housing with excellent heat dissipation
Long service life with industrial-grade components

menu_drop1.name: LRS Series Power Supply
menu_drop1.description: The Mean Well LRS Series is a compact, low-profile enclosed power supply designed for control panels, automation machines, and general industrial equipment. It offers excellent efficiency, stable DC output, and built-in safety protections while occupying minimal panel space. These power supplies are widely used in PLC panels, CNC machines, 3D printers, and conveyor systems where reliability and compact design are essential.
specs: High efficiency and low power loss

menu_drop2.name: NDR Series DIN Rail SMPS
menu_drop2.description: The NDR Series is a DIN rail mounted power supply specifically designed for industrial automation control panels. It provides stable 24V DC output with high efficiency and excellent resistance to electrical noise and surges. These units are ideal for powering PLCs, sensors, relays, HMIs, and automation systems where clean and reliable power is critical for continuous operation.

menu_drop3.name: MDR Series DIN Rail Power Supply
menu_drop3.description: The MDR Series offers ultra-slim DIN rail power supplies suitable for space-constrained control panels and compact automation systems. Despite their small size, these units provide stable power output, high reliability, and excellent thermal performance. They are commonly used in machine automation, building control systems, and electrical cabinets where efficient space utilization is essential.

menu_drop4.name: 5V DC Power Supply
menu_drop4.description: Mean Well 5V SMPS units are designed for low-voltage electronic devices, controllers, communication modules, and embedded systems requiring stable and noise-free power. These power supplies deliver precise voltage regulation, long-term reliability, and built-in protection features to ensure sensitive electronics operate safely under industrial conditions.

menu_drop5.name: 12V DC Power Supply
menu_drop5.description: Mean Well 12V power supplies are widely used for industrial control circuits, LED systems, motors, automation sensors, and security equipment. They provide stable voltage output with strong load regulation and excellent protection against power surges. Their rugged construction ensures dependable performance even in continuous industrial operation environments.
